entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 1:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 8.2°C
Wind: S 48 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 10.
